overview: "Way Below the Belt" is a celebration of double-penetration. It's a rare enough occurrence to see it once in a gay porn flick, let alone in every scene. But, director Phil St. John has stacked the deck with bottoms who can deliver and this story belongs to them. They are plowed hard by a group of very large-dicked intent tops. Men who don't only want double-fucking to look good, but make the bottoms work to achieve that.
title: Way Below the Belt
